title: Pulsetic
description:
Monitor your website’s performance with free uptime monitoring. Get real-time updates and alerts via call, SMS, Slack, Teams, Telegram, Discord, and more. Checks run every 30 seconds from 15 worldwide locations for accurate insights. 

Create custom status pages to inform users and translate them into any language for global accessibility. Stay ahead with rapid monitoring, global coverage, and personalized communication to ensure seamless performance and user satisfaction.
